name: Trucker Cargo:Mountain Driving
description:
Trucker Cargo: Mountain Driving is the ultimate driving duty to transport cargo through the rugged terrains, mountains and hills. Your transporter truck might be carrying dangerous cargo so drive carefully. Paths are difficult to drive on but you can handle this job with your perfect driving skills
Features:
• 20 Exciting Game play Missions
• Smooth Steering, Brakes, Drifting & Lifting
• Amazing 3D Graphics & City Environment
• Pick & Drop to Transport Drums & Peoples
